column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////If I were only reviewing the food
column3: I'd give the restaurant 4 stars. We ordered the Baked goat cheese (#32)
column5: and Paella Valenciana. I usually order these three dishes at every tapas place I visit
column6: and Cafe-Ba-Ba-Reeba measured up to the others. Though everything was pretty good
column7: I definitely prefer the bacon-wrapped dates at Tapas Barcelona or Avec.
